## 关于 PDFGet

PDFGet is an intelligent literature search and batch download tool designed for researchers. It integrates multiple academic databases including PubMed and Europe PMC, providing efficient literature acquisition and management capabilities.

### 项目主页
- GitHub: https://github.com/gqy20/pdfget

### 引用格式

如果您在研究中使用了 PDFGet，请考虑引用：

```bibtex
@software{pdfget2025,
  title={PDFGet: Intelligent Literature Search and Batch Download Tool},
  author={gqy},
  year={2025},
  url={https://github.com/gqy20/pdfget}
}
```
